title: Update: Four Shot, Two Dead on South Grand
content:
ST. LOUIS (KMOX) – Few details are being released about a quadruple shooting in south St. Louis that left two dead.
Officers say it happened around six Sunday morning on South Grand at Montana.
Two women have died from their injuries.
One male victim is in critical, but stable condition at a hospital.
A second male victim suffered a graze wound and was treated at the scene.
